text: Oswald "Owa" H. Johnson (January 16, 1912 - July 30, 1993)Social Security Death Index. was an American businessman and politician. Born in Black River Falls, Wisconsin, Johnson received his doctorate degree from Carroll University and owned an insurance business in Black River Falls. He served on the Black River Falls Common Council and was a Republican. In 1943, Johnson served in the Wisconsin State Assembly.Wisconsin Blue Book, 1942, Biographical Sketch of Oswald H. Johnson, p. 47. He died at his home in Black River Falls in 1993. ==Notes== ==External links== * Category:1912 births Category:1993 deaths Category:People from Black River Falls, Wisconsin Category:Carroll University alumni Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Wisconsin city council members Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:Members of the Wisconsin State Assembly Category:20th-century American businesspeople Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Oswald H. Johnson
